label: Trypanosomatida procyclic stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of trypanosomatidae in which the organism is in dividing form and it occurs in fly vector.

label: procyclic promastigote stage
definition: A promastigote stage where the form of parasite is short, ovoid, and slightly motile.

label: procyclic trypomastigote stage
definition: A trypomastigote stage where trypomastigote form of parasites are in dividing form. This stage occurs in fly vector.

label: Plasmodium macrogamete stage
definition: A macrogamete stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium microgamete stage
definition: A microgamete stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium oocyst stage
definition: An oocyst stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs on the hemocoel side of the midgut of a mosquito vector. During this stage Plasmodium ookinete invades and escapes midgut wall of mosquito and embed itself onto the exterior of the gut membrane and develop encysted zygote, called oocyst.

label: Plasmodium ookinete stage
definition: An ookinete stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the midgut of a mosquito vector and on the outside of the midgut.

label: Plasmodium zygote stage
definition: A zygote stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the midgut of the mosquito vector where a microgamete and a macrogamete fertilizes each other to produce a diploid cell.

label: Plasmodium falciparum exflagellated microgametocyte stage
definition: An exflagellated microgametocyte stage in the lifecycle of Plasmodium falciparum that occurs in the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium falciparum macrogamete stage
definition: A macrogamete stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium falciparum oocyst stage
definition: An oocyst stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs on the hemocoel side of the midgut of a mosquito vector. During this stage Plasmodium falciparum ookinete invades and escapes midgut wall of mosquito and embed itself onto the exterior of the gut membrane and develop encysted zygote, called oocyst.

label: Plasmodium falciparum microgamete stage
definition: A microgamete stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium falciparum ookinete stage
definition: An ookinete stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the midgut of a mosquito vector and on the outside of the midgut.

label: Plasmodium falciparum zygote stage
definition: A zygote stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the midgut of the mosquito vector where a microgamete and a macrogamete fertilizes each other to produce a diploid cell.

label: Plasmodium falciparum gamete stage
definition: A gamete stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium falciparum microgametocyte stage
definition: A microgametocyte stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs either in the bloodstream of a human host or the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium falciparum macrogametocyte stage
definition: A macrogametocyte stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs either in the bloodstream of a human host or the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium falciparum gametocyte stage
definition: A gametocyte stage in the lifecycle of Plasmodium falciparum.

label: Plasmodium macrogametocyte stage
definition: A macrogametocyte stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs either in the bloodstream of a vertebrate host or the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium microgametocyte stage
definition: A microgametocyte stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs either in the bloodstream of a vertebrate host or the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium falciparum sporozoite stage
occurs in: Anopheles salivary gland|Homo sapiens blood|Homo sapiens hepatocyte
definition: A sporozoite stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the salivary glands of the mosquito and invades hepatocytes in the human host.

label: Plasmodium sporozoite stage
definition: A sporozoite stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the salivary glands of the mosquito and invades hepatocytes in the vertebrate host.

label: Schistosoma mansoni daughter sporocyst stage
definition: A daughter sporocyst stage of Schistosoma mansoni that occurs in the snail intermediate host.

label: Schistosoma haematobium daughter sporocyst stage
definition: A daughter sporocyst stage in the lifecycle of Schistosoma haematobium that occurs within the snail intermediate host.

label: asexual lifecycle in host red blood cell stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage that occurs as a result of asexual replication in the red blood cells of the host organism. For Plasmodium species these stages can include merozoites, trophozoites, and schizonts.

label: erythrocytic trophozoite stage
definition: A trophozoite stage in some protozoan parasite life cycle that occurs in erythrocytes.

label: Trypanosoma brucei procyclic trypomastigote stage
definition: A procyclic promastigote stage in the Trypanosoma brucei lifecycle.

label: Trypanosoma brucei epimastigote stage
definition: An epimastigote stage in the lifecycle of Trypanosoma brucei.

label: Trypanosoma brucei metacyclic trypomastigote stage
definition: A metacyclic trypomastigote stage in the lifecycle of Trypanosoma brucei that occurs either in vertebrate host bloodstream or in salivary glands of an insect vector.

label: hepatic merozoite stage
definition: A merozoite stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the hepatocyte of a vertebrate host.

label: hepatic trophozoite stage
definition: A trophozoite stage in some protozoan parasite life cycle that occurs in hepatocytes.

label: Plasmodium falciparum erythrocytic schizont stage
definition: An erythrocytic schizont stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the infected erythrocytes of a human host.

label: Plasmodium falciparum merozoite stage
definition: A merozoite stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the bloodstream or hepatocytes of a human host.

label: Plasmodium falciparum erythrocytic trophozoite stage
definition: An erythrocytic trophozoite stage in the Plasmodium falciparum life cycle that occurs in erythrocytes of a human host.

label: Plasmodium falciparum schizont stage
definition: A schizont stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in erythrocytes or in hepatocytes.

label: Plasmodium falciparum trophozoite stage
definition: A trophozoite stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in a human host.

label: Plasmodium falciparum hepatic schizont stage
definition: A hepatic schizont stage in the lifecycle of Plasmodium falciparum that occurs in the infected hepatocytes of a human host.

label: Plasmodium falciparum hepatic trophozoite stage
definition: A hepatic trophozoite stage in the Plasmodium falciparum life cycle that occurs in hepatocytes of a human host.

label: Schistosoma japonicum 7 week worm stage
occurs in: Homo sapiens intestine|Homo sapiens mesenteric vein
definition: A 7 week worm stage of Schistosoma japonicum that is the mature stage of Schistosoma japonicum and found in the small superior mesenteric blood vessels associated with the ileo-caecal area of the intestine of the definitive host 7 weeks after weeks after infection.

label: Schistosoma japonicum 3 week worm stage
definition: A worm stage of Schistosoma japonicum that is found in the small superior mesenteric blood vessels associated with the ileo-caecal area of the intestine of the definitive host 3 weeks after infection.

label: Schistosoma haematobium 3 week worm stage
definition: A worm stage of Schistosoma haematobium that is found in the pelvic blood vessels of the vesicle plexis of the definitive host 3 weeks after infection.

label: Schistosoma haematobium 7 week worm stage
definition: A 7 week worm stage of Schistosoma haematobium that is the mature stage of Schistosoma haematobium and found in the pelvic blood vessels of the vesicle plexis of the definitive host 7 weeks after weeks after infection .

label: parasite lifecycle in host liver stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage that occurs in the liver of the host organism. For Plasmodium species these stages can include sporozoites, trophozoites, schizonts, and merozoites.

label: Trypanosoma brucei trypomastigote stage
definition: A trypomastigote stage in the Trypanosoma brucei lifecycle that occurs in the vertebrate host.

label: Trypanosoma cruzi metacyclic trypomastigote stage
definition: A metacyclic trypomastigote stage in the lifecycle of Trypanosoma cruzi that occurs in a vertebrate host.

label: Trypanosoma cruzi trypomastigote stage
definition: A trypomastigote stage in the Trypanosoma cruzi lifecycle that occurs either in the vertebrate host or an insect vector.

label: Schistosoma mansoni 7 week worm stage
definition: A 7 week worm stage of Schistosoma mansoni that is the mature stage of Schistosoma mansoni and found in the small inferior mesenteric blood vessels surrounding the large intestine of the definitive host 7 weeks after weeks after infection.

label: Schistosoma haematobium 3 day schistosomulum stage
definition: A 3 days schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma haematobium occurs in the definitive host 3 days post-infection.

label: Schistosoma haematobium 6 day schistosomulum stage
definition: A 6 day schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma haematobium that occurs in the definitive host 6 days post-infection.

label: Schistosoma japonicum 6 day schistosomulum stage
definition: A schistosoma japonicum schistosomulum stage that occurs in the definitive host 6 days post-infection.

label: Schistosoma japonicum 3 day schistosomulum stage
definition: A 3 days schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma japonicum that occurs in the definitive host 3 days post-infection.

label: Schistosoma mansoni 3 day schistosomulum stage
definition: A 3 days schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma mansoni that occurs in the definitive host 3 days post-infection.

label: Schistosoma mansoni 6 day schistosomulum stage
definition: A 6 day schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma mansoni that occurs in the definitive host 6 days post-infection.

label: Leishmania major amastigote stage
definition: An amastigote stage in the lifecycle of Leishmania major that occurs in mammalian hosts.

label: Trypanosoma cruzi amastigote stage
definition: An amastigote stage in the lifecycle of Trypanosoma cruzi that occurs in mammalian hosts.

label: Leishmania major promastigote stage
definition: A promastigote stage in the Leishmania major lifecycle.

label: Leishmania major metacyclic promastigote stage
definition: A metacyclic promastigote stage in the lifecycle of Leishmania major.

label: Schistosoma mansoni 3 week worm stage
definition: A worm stage of Schistosoma mansoni that is found in the small inferior mesenteric blood vessels surrounding the large intestine of the definitive host 3 weeks after infection.

label: Schistosoma haematobium 3 hour schistosomulum stage
definition: A 3 hours schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma haematobium that occurs in the definitive host 3 hours post-infection.

label: Schistosoma haematobium 24 hour schistosomulum stage
definition: A 24 hours schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma haematobium that occurs in the definitive host 24 hours post-infection.

label: Schistosoma japonicum 3 hour schistosomulum stage
definition: A 3 hours schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma japonicum that occurs in the definitive host 3 hours post-infection.

label: Schistosoma japonicum 24 hour schistosomulum stage
definition: A 24 hours schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma japonicum that occurs in the definitive host 24 hours post-infection.

label: Schistosoma mansoni 24 hour schistosomulum stage
definition: A 24 hours schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma mansoni that occurs in the definitive host 24 hours post-infection.

label: Schistosoma mansoni 3 hour schistosomulum stage
definition: A 3 hours schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma mansoni that occurs in the definitive host 3 hours post-infection.

label: Schistosoma japonicum daughter sporocyst stage
definition: A daughter sporocyst stage of Schistosoma japonicum that occurs in the snail intermediate host.

label: Leishmania major procyclic promastigote stage
definition: A procyclic promastigote stage in the Leishmania major lifecycle.

label: salivary gland-derived sporozoite stage
definition: A sporozoite stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the hemocoel and the salivary glands of the mosquito. Sporozoites invade hepatocytes in the vertebrate host.

label: Trypanosoma cruzi epimastigote stage
definition: An epimastigote stage in the lifecycle of Trypanosoma cruzi.

label: Plasmodium erythrocytic schizont stage
definition: An erythrocytic schizont stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the infected erythrocytes of a vertebrate host.

label: Plasmodium erythrocytic trophozoite stage
definition: An erythrocytic trophozoite stage in the Plasmodium life cycle that occurs in erythrocytes of a vertebrate host.

label: Plasmodium trophozoite stage
definition: A trophozoite stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in a vertebrate host.

label: Plasmodium hepatic schizont stage
definition: A hepatic schizont stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the infected hepatocytes of a vertebrate host.

label: Plasmodium hepatic trophozoite stage
definition: A hepatic trophozoite stage in the Plasmodium life cycle that occurs in hepatocytes of a vertebrate host.

label: Leishmania major lifecycle stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of Leishmania major.

label: miracidium stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of Trematodes where the parasite is in free-living motile form, covered with cilia and settles in the mollusc to become a sporocyst.

label: microgamete stage
definition: A gamete stage in apicomplexan parasites when exflagellated microgametocyte divides into microgamete.

label: merozoite stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of apicomplexan species where a daughter cell, called merozoite is produced from schizont through schizogony.

label: trophozoite stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of some protozoan parasites that is a non-reproductive, feeding and growing stage.

label: cercaria stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage that is a free-living larval stage of Digenea, developed within the germinal cells of the sporocyst or redia. A cercaria has a tapering head with large penetration glands. It may or may not have a long swimming "tail", depending on the species. The motile cercaria finds and settles in a host where it will become either an adult, or a mesocercaria, or a metacercaria, according to species.

label: oocyst stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of sporozoa consisting of a zygote enclosed by cyst wall.

label: parasitic worm stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of some parasites in which the parasite develops into a worm form, and undergoes maturation.

label: schizont stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage that is the multinucleate stage in the development of some members of the Sarcodina and some sporozoans during schizogony.

label: macrogamete stage
definition: A gamete stage in parasites when macrogametocytes produce macrogametes through the process known as gametogenesis.

label: schistomulum stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage that is the migratory stage between cercaria and adult of the schistosomes; equivalent to the metacercarial stage in other digeneans.

label: sporocyst stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage that is the early developmental stage capable of asexual reproduction: in sporozoans it is usually enclosed within an oocyst; in digeneans it is an intramolluscan stage lacking a gut.

label: epimastigote stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of Trypanosomatids. During this stage, the undulating membrane is shortened and the flagellar pocket and the kinetoplast are anterior to the nucleus. This stage occurs in the insect host.

label: amastigote stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage is a nonflagellate intracellular developmental stage in the trypanosomatid parasites lifecycle that occurs in mammalian host.

label: sporozoite stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of some sporozoans where cells divide through sporogony producing daughter cells called sporozoites that infect new hosts.

label: ookinete stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of some sporozoans where motile and elongated zygote is formed by the fertilization of the macrogamete during the sexual reproductive phase of the sporozoan life cycle, specifically the malarial parasite Plasmodium.

label: hypnozoite stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of some Plasmodium sp., such as Plasmodium vivax and Plasmodium ovale, the parasite in the liver cells do not achieve matuaration to a schizont immediately, but remain in a dormant form. This dormant form stage is called hypnozoite stage.

label: parasite lifecycle stage
definition: A life cycle stage of a parasite.

label: Plasmodium gamete stage
definition: A gamete stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the midgut of a mosquito vector.

label: Plasmodium gametocyte stage
definition: A gametocyte stage in the lifecycle of Plasmodium.

label: Plasmodium merozoite stage
definition: A merozoite stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the bloodstream or hepatocytes of a vertebrate host.

label: Plasmodium erythrocytic merozoite stage
definition: An erythrocytic merozoite stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the bloodstream of a vertebrate host.

label: Plasmodium hepatic merozoite stage
definition: A hepatic merozoite stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the hepatocyte of a vertebrate host.

label: Plasmodium schizont stage
definition: A schizont stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in erythrocytes or in hepatocytes.

label: Plasmodium oocyst-derived sporozoite stage
definition: A sporozoite stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that develops in oocysts of the mosquito midgut.

label: Plasmodium salivary gland-derived sporozoite stage
definition: A salivary gland-derived sporozoite stage in the Plasmodium lifecycle that occurs in the salivary glands of the mosquito and invades hepatocytes in the vertebrate host.

label: Plasmodium erythrocytic ring trophozoite stage
definition: An erythrocytic ring trophozoite stage in the Plasmodium life cycle that occurs in erythrocytes of a vertebrate host. During this stage some Plasmodium merozoites undergo asexual reproduction cycle in erythrocytes and form young trophozoites that are referred to as "ring form" due to their morphology.

label: Plasmodium falciparum erythrocytic ring trophozoite stage
definition: An erythrocytic ring trophozoite stage in the Plasmodium falciparum life cycle that occurs in erythrocytes of a human host. During this stage some Plasmodium falciparum merozoites undergo asexual reproduction cycle in erythrocytes and form young trophozoites that are referred to as "ring form" due to their morphology.

label: Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle stage
definition: A lifecycle stage of Plasmodium falciparum.

label: Plasmodium falciparum erythrocytic merozoite stage
definition: An erythrocytic merozoite stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the bloodstream of a human host.

label: Plasmodium falciparum hepatic merozoite stage
definition: A hepatic merozoite stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the hepatocyte of a human host.

label: Plasmodium falciparum oocyst-derived sporozoite stage
definition: A sporozoite stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the hemocoel and the salivary glands of the mosquito. Sporozoites invade hepatocytes in the human host.

label: Plasmodium falciparum salivary gland-derived sporozoite stage
definition: A salivary gland-derived sporozoite stage in the Plasmodium falciparum lifecycle that occurs in the hemocoel and the salivary glands of the mosquito. Sporozoites invade hepatocytes in the human host.

label: Schistosoma haematobium sporocyst stage
definition: A sporocyst stage in the Schistosoma haematobium lifecycle that occurs within the snail intermediate host.

label: Schistosoma haematobium miracidium stage
definition: A miracidium stage in the Schistosoma haematobium lifecycle that occurs in the intermediate snail host.

label: Schistosoma haematobium worm stage
definition: A worm stage of Schistosoma haematobium that is fully developed mature form and found in the pelvic blood vessels of the vesicle plexis of the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma haematobium cercaria stage
definition: A cercaria stage in the lifecycle of Schistosoma haematobium that occurs in a freshwater snail and in fresh water.

label: Schistosoma haematobium egg stage
definition: An egg stage in the lifecycle of Schistosoma haematobium that occurs in the mammalian host..

label: Schistosoma haematobium lifecycle stage
definition: A lifecycle stage of Schistosoma haematobium.

label: Schistosoma haematobium schistosomulum stage
definition: A schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma haematobium that occurs in the definitive host and is followed by the parasitic worm stage.

label: Schistosoma haematobium mother sporocyst stage
definition: A mother sporocyst stage in the Schistosoma haematobium lifecycle that occurs in the snail intermediate host.

label: Schistosoma haematobium adult male worm stage
definition: An adult male worm stage of Schistosoma haematobium that is fully developed mature male stage of Schistosoma haematobium and found in the pelvic blood vessels of the vesicle plexis of the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma haematobium adult female worm stage
definition: An adult female worm stage of Schistosoma haematobium that is fully developed mature female stage of Schistosoma haematobium and found in the pelvic blood vessels of the vesicle plexis of the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma haematobium adult worm stage
definition: An adult worm stage in the Schistosoma haematobium lifecycle.

label: Schistosoma japonicum cercaria stage
definition: A cercaria stage in the lifecycle of Schistosoma japonicum that occurs in a freshwater snail and in fresh water.

label: Schistosoma japonicum miracidium stage
definition: A miracidium stage in the Schistosoma japonicum lifecycle that occurs in the intermediate snail host.

label: Schistosoma japonicum worm stage
definition: A worm stage of Schistosoma japonicum that is fully developed mature form and found in the small superior mesenteric blood vessels associated with the ileo-caecal area of the intestine of the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma japonicum egg stage
definition: An egg stage in the lifecycle of Schistosoma japonicum that occurs in the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma japonicum schistosomulum stage
definition: A schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma japonicum that occurs in the definitive host and is followed by the parasitic worm stage.

label: Schistosoma japonicum lifecycle stage
definition: A lifecycle stage of Schistosoma japonicum.

label: Schistosoma japonicum mother sporocyst stage
definition: A mother sporocyst stage in the Schistosoma japonicum lifecycle that occurs in the snail intermediate host.

label: Schistosoma japonicum sporocyst stage
definition: A sporocyst stage in the Schistosoma japonicum lifecycle that is found within the snail intermediate host.

label: Schistosoma japonicum adult female worm stage
definition: An adult female worm stage of Schistosoma japonicum that is fully developed mature female stage of Schistosoma japonicum and occurs in the small superior mesenteric blood vessels associated with the ileo-caecal area of the intestine of the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma japonicum adult male worm stage
definition: An adult male worm stage of Schistosoma japonicum that is fully developed mature male stage of Schistosoma japonicum and occurs in the small superior mesenteric blood vessels associated with the ileo-caecal area of the intestine of the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma japonicum adult worm stage
definition: An adult worm stage in the Schistosoma japonicum lifecycle.

label: Schistosoma mansoni sporocyst stage
definition: A sporocyst stage in the Schistosoma mansoni lifecycle that occurs in the snail intermediate host.

label: Schistosoma mansoni schistosomulum stage
definition: A schistosomulum stage of Schistosoma mansoni that occurs in the definitive host and is followed by the parasitic worm stage.

label: Schistosoma mansoni miracidium stage
definition: A miracidium stage in the Schistosoma mansoni lifecycle that occurs in the intermediate snail host.

label: Schistosoma mansoni egg stage
definition: An egg stage in the lifecycle of Schistosoma mansoni that occurs in the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma mansoni mother sporocyst stage
definition: A mother sporocyst stage in the Schistosoma mansoni lifecycle that occurs in the snail intermediate host.

label: Schistosoma mansoni lifecycle stage
definition: A lifecycle stage of Schistosoma mansoni.

label: Schistosoma mansoni cercaria stage
definition: A cercaria stage in the lifecycle of Schistosoma mansoni that occurs in a freshwater snail and in fresh water.

label: Schistosoma mansoni worm stage
definition: A worm stage of Schistosoma mansoni that is fully developed mature form and found in the small inferior mesenteric blood vessels surrounding the large intestine of the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma mansoni adult male worm stage
definition: An adult male worm stage of Schistosoma mansoni that is fully developed mature male stage of Schistosoma mansoni and found in the small inferior mesenteric blood vessels surrounding the large intestine of the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma mansoni adult female worm stage
definition: An adult female worm stage of Schistosoma mansoni that is fully developed mature female stage of Schistosoma mansoni and found in the small inferior mesenteric blood vessels surrounding the large intestine of the mammalian host.

label: Schistosoma mansoni adult worm stage
definition: An adult worm stage in the Schistosoma mansoni lifecycle.

label: trypomastigote stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of trypanosomes. In trypomastigote stage, the kinetoplast is near the posterior end of the body, and the flagellum lies attached to the cell body for most of its length by an undulating membrane.

label: Trypanosoma brucei lifecycle stage
definition: A lifecycle stage of Trypanosoma brucei.

label: Trypanosoma cruzi lifecycle stage
definition: A lifecycle stage of Trypanosoma cruzi.

label: Trypanosomatida metacyclic stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of trypanosomatidae in which the organism is infectious and does not multiply.

label: promastigote stage
definition: A parasite lifecycle stage of Trypanosomatids. In this stage, the flagellum is found anterior of nucleus and flagellum not attached to the cell body. The kinetoplast is located in front of the nucleus, near the anterior end of the body. (Wikipedia: Trypanosomatid)

label: metacyclic promastigote stage
definition: A promastigote stage of some kinetoplastids.

label: metacyclic trypomastigote stage
definition: A trypomastigote stage of Trypanosoma species which are nondividing forms resistant to mammalian complement that have the capacity to infect mammalian cells.

label: macrogametocyte stage
definition: A gametocyte stage where a cell differentiates into a female sexual form called macrogametocyte.

label: microgametocyte stage
definition: A gametocyte stage where a cell differentiates into a male sexual form called microgametocyte.

label: mother sporocyst stage
definition: A sporocyst stage of Digenea formed after penetration of the miracidium into a mollusc; it lacks a gut and gives rise asexually to daughter sporocysts or rediae.

label: oocyst-derived sporozoite stage
definition: A sporozoite stage in some parasite lifecycle that occurs in the hemocoel and the salivary glands of the mosquito. Sporozoites invade hepatocytes in the vertebrate host.

label: 24 hour schistosomulum stage
definition: A schistosomulum stage that occurs in 24 hours after infection of the mammalian host.

label: 3 day schistosomulum stage
definition: A schistosomulum stage that occurs in 3 days after infection of the mammalian host.

label: 3 hour schistosomulum stage
definition: A schistosomulum stage that occurs in 3 hours after infection of the mammalian host.

label: 3 week parasitic worm stage
definition: A parasitic worm stage of development 3 weeks post differentiation into a worm form.

label: 6 day schistosomulum stage
definition: A schistosomulum stage that occurs in 6 days after infection of the mammalian host.

label: 7 week parasitic worm stage
definition: A parasitic worm stage of development 7 weeks post differentiation into a worm form.

label: adult female parasitic worm stage
definition: An adult worm stage of a female parasitic worm.

label: adult male parasitic worm stage
definition: An adult worm stage of a male parasitic worm.

label: adult parasitic worm stage
definition: A parasitic worm stage where the worm is matured and ready to pair up with another adult worm of the opposite gender, and reproduce.

label: bloodstream trypomastigote stage
definition: A trypomastigote stage where trypmastigote form of parasites are found in mammalian host blood stream.

label: daughter sporocyst stage
definition: A sporocyst stage of Trematodes produced by a mother sporocyst; it lacks a gut and is capable of asexual production of either rediae or cercariae.

label: egg stage
definition: A life cycle stage of some parasites in which a non-operculate egg emerges from the adult female worm.

label: erythrocytic merozoite stage
definition: A merozoite stage in the apicomplexan lifecycle that occurrs in the bloodstream of a vertebrate host.

label: erythrocytic ring trophozoite stage
definition: An early trophozoite stage of Plasmodium sp. where a large central vacuole and peripheral nucleus give an appearance of a signet ring.

label: erythrocytic schizont stage
definition: A schizont stage that occurs in erythrocytes where trophozoites mature into a schizont and schizont produces daughter trophozoites or merozoites.

label: exflagellated microgametocyte stage
definition: A microgametocyte stage in some apicomplexan parasites where microgametocyte gets matured and form microgamete through the process known as exflagellation.

label: gamete stage
definition: A life cycle stage of some parasites that develop into mature sexual cells.

label: gametocyte stage
definition: A life cycle stage where a cell differentiates into male or female sexual forms.

label: hepatic schizont stage
definition: A schizont stage that occurs in hepatocyte where sporozoites mature into a schizont.

label: bradyzoite stage
definition: A life cycle stage found in the tissue cyst which replicates slowly within a parasitophorous vacuole within the host cell.
